Posts.Title: To all you lovely ladies out there.

Posts.Content: I too have just had my first yearly mammagram which went well I would like to share this ode my daughter sent me she is fab actually she is my step daughter which somehow makes it more special in some ways she knew how frightened /uptight /scared I wss before so after it was all fine and I got the all clear she wrote a long card to me but the jist  of the ode was she wrote COUNT YOUR SMILES INSTEAD OF TEARS COUNT YOUR  COURAGE INSTEAD OF YOUR FEARS  I was really touched by that sorry to  go on a bit but thought I might cheer someone up it did me
Posts.Title: Year on mammogram coming up

Posts.Content: Hi eveyone this is my first time on blog like jenni I too was in the same boat almost idetical all over the place had mixed emotions will l my husband stay will he leave me after op but in the end he was fab I still have bad days and feel guilty for putting my family though it all but I am alive for my famlily its not a nice or easy journey but it does get better each passing day
Posts.Title: dcis diagnosis 1st new blog
